course.subject: ORIE
course.course_title: Operations Research Tools for Financial Engineering
course.class_descr: Oper Res Tools for Finan Engr

notes.note: Enrollment limited to: MEng students only.

Prerequisite: senior or graduate standing in an Engineering field; concurrent or recent (past two years) enrollment in a group-based project with a strong system design component that is approved by a course instructor.
Offered first half of term. Co-meets with ORIE 4580.
